entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
